subject: Fw: Thank you, we are ready to give a loan
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$444,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this short form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://milliaiemiilia.com/
